body_html: I think maybe a more general fix is to remove CHECKs from the constructor and rely on the later call to the HloVerifier to catch problems. HloInstruction::CreateFromProto would do the absolute minimum amount of verification that is required to call the constructors. In any case, I can take care of it.

body: I think maybe a more general fix is to remove CHECKs from the constructor and rely on the later call to the HloVerifier to catch problems. HloInstruction::CreateFromProto would do the absolute minimum amount of verification that is required to call the constructors. In any case, I can take care of it.
